name: Bloodmoore: Key of Blood
description:
Bloodmoore: Key of Blood is a pixelated RPG  with horror elements. Follow Josiah Ecoutez, Anna Wilhemina, and Emma Taylor as they explore a terrifying legacy filled with demons and vampires.  This game was made as a University project in 3 weeks and is the first game I have created.  

Thanks for checking it out!
